job_history.work_description: Facilitate an extended day program for 15 high school freshmen, providing academic support and assisting in the development of social and school success skills in a safe and positive learning environment.
Coordinated LAMP:ARA, which aims to offer Benson Latino High School students personalized mentorship, academic support, college preparation, and leadership development.
Organized and managed Causa's volunteer engagement and voter registration.
Provided students with a safe, receptive space in which to write and the tools needed to approach academic writing with confidence and zeal.

Facilitated all of the Low and High Challenge Course elements, many group 'initiatives,' the rock climbing wall, and the BMX course at camp; planned activities to encourage personal growth; and led extensive training in team building.

skills.name: Leadership
skills.explanation: Has extensive experience leading and facilitating groups, including managing a team as a School Success Advocate and coordinating the Latino Mentor Program, indicating strong proficiency.

skills.name: Mentorship
skills.explanation: Provided personalized mentorship to students as a Latino Mentor Program Coordinator and academic support as a School Success Advocate, suggesting strong proficiency.

skills.name: Project Management
skills.explanation: Coordinated and managed various programs, including the Latino Mentor Program and volunteer engagement, showing a solid working proficiency.

skills.name: Communication
skills.explanation: Effectively communicated with students, staff, and volunteers in various roles, including as a Bilingual Writing Tutor and School Success Advocate, indicating strong proficiency.

skills.name: Team Building
skills.explanation: Facilitated team-building activities and led groups in various settings, including as an Adventure Team Facilitator, suggesting strong proficiency.

skills.name: Academic Support
skills.explanation: Provided academic support to students as a School Success Advocate and Bilingual Writing Tutor, indicating strong proficiency.

skills.name: Social Justice
skills.explanation: Demonstrated interest in social justice and border politics, but lacks direct experience, showing a solid working proficiency.

skills.name: Public Speaking
skills.explanation: Likely developed public speaking skills through various roles, including as a School Success Advocate and Bilingual Writing Tutor, showing a solid working proficiency.
